Question: In March 2002, this person's book Statecraft: Strategies for a Changing World, dedicated to Ronald Reagan, was released.
Hints: This person later wrote: "I always found the Queen's attitude towards the work of the Government absolutely correct ..
Of the 374 Conservative MPs eligible to vote, 314 voted for this person and 33 for Meyer.
This person was not initially the obvious replacement, but she eventually became the main challenger, promising a fresh start.
